{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless-N 300M Router |caption2 = with Highly Secure Business-class Connectivity for Small Offices/Home Offices (SOHO) |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Cisco |model = CVR100W |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5357C0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H511638J-LCCC; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = D8:24:BD |oui = D8:24:BD |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = cisco |defaultpass = cisco |defaultssid = cisco-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^cisco-[0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://www.cisco.com/web/CN/solutions/industry/segment_sol/small/products/routers/pdf/CVR100W_Datasheet_OL-26192_en.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/cvr100w/administration/guide/CVR100W_AG_OL-26942_02.pdf Administration guide]
[http://www.cisco.com/web/CN/solutions/industry/segment_sol/small/products/routers/pdf/CVR100W_OSD_1.0.1.1x.pdf Open source used in the CVR100W] :device is using kernel 2.6.22 [http://www.pcpop.com/doc/0/778/778068_all.shtml Review on '''pcpop.com'''] :'''Broadcom''' BCM5357C0KFBG WiSoC :'''Samsung''' K4H511638J-LCCC RAM :appears to be using a '''Winbond''' serial flash [http://product.pchome.net/network_wireless_router_cisco_ciscocvr100w/pic_358751.html On '''pchome.net'''] (w/ external images) :Serial numbers appear to start with '''CBT1''' (CyberTAN vendor code) [http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201204/show2523362c7p1.html '''''Most humane Router: Cisco CVR100W new wireless router reproduced (Figure)''''' on '''ido.3mt.com.cn'''] (white model) Additional specifications, as per the datasheet, follow.. *Antennas: two internal omni-directional antennas w/ 1.8 dBi gain *Transmit power **802.11b: 17 dBm +- 1.5 dBm **802.11g: 15 dBm +- 1.5 dBm **802.11n: 12.5 dBm +- 1.5 dBm *Receiver sensitivity **-87 dBm @ 11Mbps **-71 dBm @ 54Mbps **-68 dBm @ MSC15, HT20 **-66 dBm @ MCS15, HT40 *Dimensions (WxHxD): [[Dimensions:: 203.7 mm x 169.3 mm x 35.4 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::380 g]] Two models are specified in the datasheet... *CVR100W-B20-K9-CN - Black model *CVR100W-W20-K9-CN - White model Default settings are per '''Cisco''''s admistration guide. :The default SSID format is specified as '''cisco-xxxx'''. The '''xxxx''' ''appears'' to be a 4 digit number. {{WiFiCert|WFA18149|02/26/2013}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
